mapper.select: SELECT p1.PLACE_SEQ, p1.PLACE_NAME, r1.PLACE_SEQ, r1.UUID_NAME, r1.ORIGIN_NAME, r1.IMG_URL, r1.CONTENT FROM PLACE p1 JOIN REVIEWBOARD r1 ON p1.PLACE_SEQ = r1.PLACE_SEQ WHERE r1.PLACE_SEQ = #{place_seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PLACE (PLACE_SEQ, ONEDAY_SEQ, STEP, PLACE_NAME, XLAT, YLNG, MEMO) VALUES(SEQ_ONEDAY.NEXTVAL, #{oneday_seq}, #{step}, #{place_name}, #{xlat}, #{ylng}, '')
mapper.update: UPDATE PLACE SET STEP = STEP-1 WHERE STEP > (SELECT STEP FROM PLACE WHERE PLACE_SEQ=#{place_seq})
